info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 1:25PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Mercer and south central Rock Island Counties through 200 PM CDT... At 124 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Eliza, or 9 miles northwest of Aledo, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could break tree limbs, knock down weak trees and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Aledo, Millersburg, Matherville, Eliza, Joy, Hamlet, Gingle Corners, Aledo Mercer County Airport, Old Gilchrist, Petersville, Marston and Mercer County Fairgrounds. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
